value.0: "Thank you so much. We feared we would never be released from there. I know not who this master is, but the goblins truly fear him."
"No! You'll have to catch us first!"
"Thank you, kind <sir/madam>."

"Serah told us the Masked Man was killed in battle but the goblins seem to be recruiting other creatures for someone they call 'the Master.' It seems they've already found someone to replace him as leader."
"Many of the goblins were killed in the Masked Man's attack, but they fear their new ruler more than they fear death."

Comment.value: if slaves locked in huts, this is on door.

value.0: "Is there someone there? We could hear the fighting. The goblins have enslaved us. Please let us out!"
"Alright... but please come back soon!"
"What cruel <man/woman> would do such a thing? Have mercy on us, please!"
"I have nothing! They took everything we owned. Please set us free! For the love of the gods!"
"The goblin shaman locked us in here. He might have the key."
"I'm a farmhand from the keep. Many of us were captured, but most have been dragged off to see someone they call 'the Master'."
"Please! We are hungry and frightened. Whoever you are, set us free."
"Thank you so much for your rescue. I am here giving thanks to the gods, but I want to thank you too. I wish I had something to give you. I will pray for you though."
"I have decided to be merciful, and kill you quickly."
"You should go now."
"Do you know anything about the Masked Man's forces?"
<StartAction>[Walk away from the door.]</Start>

Comment.value:
if pc has slave key
spawn 3 slaves outside of huts.

value.0: <StartAction>[Use key to open door.]</Start>
"I'll be back when I find the key."
"I think I'll let you suffer a bit more."
"Is there a reward for freeing you?"
"I don't have a key."
"Who are you?"
